it's time to make some potato salad so I

today's recipe is kind of fun it's an
avocado and jicama dip cut up Rioja
kados and get them into a bowl peel your
jicama it's got a nice thin skin it
almost has skin the texture of ginger
doesn't taste anything like ginger
though then cut your jicama in small
pieces about the same size as the
avocado that can go into the bowl with
the avocado then for some flavoring for
scallions thinly sliced and then some
lime juice about a quarter of a cup stir
together season with some salt and
pepper
and then stir you want everything fully
combined you can mash up some of the
avocado and leave some pieces a little
bit chunky and this is definitely enough
for a party all right
now for the fun part the tasting see if
